title: 'Budget clarifying shampoo'
body: 'This is a lovely product . I have been using this for last 5 years for clarifying my hair . I have curly hair . And this works beautifully. The trick is to dilute a few dollops of the shampoo with 1/2 a mug of water - this way  it cleans well without drying out the hair. Yes  it also washes away the oil in one go (even when it‚Äôs diluted with water ). Overall a good product . This is something I always repurchase.'
